itemDescription: English professional footballer who played as a centre forward (1877-1959)

wikipedia_page.main: Richard Smith (29 October 1877 – 10 December 1959) was an English professional footballer who played as a centre forward. He started his career with hometown club Workington before moving to Football League side Burnley in 1904.
